text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/subscriptions-backport/CodeSystem/backport-notification-error-code-system defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
unreachable UnreachableThe subscription endpoint is currently unreachable.
certificate-error Certificate ErrorThe subscription endpoint has an invalid certificate.
timeout TimeoutAn attempt to send a notification has timed out.
processing Processing ErrorAn error occurred while processing the event or notification.
unathorized UnauthorizedThe server has determined the endpoint is not authorized to receive notifications.

name: BackportNotificationErrorCodeSystem
title: R5 Subscription Error Code System
description: Codes to represent error states on subscriptions.

concept.definition: The subscription endpoint is currently unreachable.
The subscription endpoint has an invalid certificate.
An attempt to send a notification has timed out.
An error occurred while processing the event or notification.
The server has determined the endpoint is not authorized to receive notifications.
